name: Fix Tic-Tac-Toe Game Bug
description: Fix a bug in a pygame-based tic-tac-toe game that prevents proper win detection
goal: Fix the tic-tac-toe game in game.py so that it correctly detects wins and displays the winner. The game should properly identify when a player wins with three in a row (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) and display the winner message. Run with 'python game.py' and ensure the game works correctly.
